t_korean: ^Gathers power to cleave a target from the bottom up. Bonus damage depends on the charge stage.

t_key: Max: Deals 200% bonus damage. <O_Y>(25% chance to destabilize.)</O_Y>
<G_Y>Damage is increased by 50% in PvP maps.</G_Y>^

t_jpn: depending on the charge level decreases enemy's Critical Hit Dmg for 15 secs.

t_korean: ^Gathers up power for an upward strike. At full charge
t_jpn: the target will be launched and thrown backwards.^

t_korean: ^Gathers up power for an upward strike. At full charge
t_jpn: the target will be launched and thrown backwards.^

t_korean: ^Make a shout to maximize your strength with an unyielding spirit.

t_key: - For 10 seconds decreases damage taken by 70% with the <G_Y> Shield </G_Y> effect.^
- The damage reduction effects <R_Y>do not stack</R_Y> with the <G_Y>Pleasure</G_Y> effect.^
